document.full_text: one bystander was killed when jordanian security forces used batons and sprayed water to disperse a clash between pro-monarchy demonstrators who hurled stones at protesters calling for political reform, a witness said.
document.title: one killed as jordan police disperse clash
lines_and_colors: one bystander was killed when jordanian security forces used batons and sprayed water to disperse a clash between pro-monarchy demonstrators who hurled stones at protesters calling for political reform, a witness said.
